items.content_html: The "react-query-fetch" repository offers a minimal setup for React with Vite, TypeScript, and React Query for efficient state management and data fetching. It serves as a lightweight alternative to Redux, promoting modern coding practices and keeping development skills up-to-date.
items.title: itsyst/react-query-fetch: The "react-query-fetch" repository offers a minimal setup for React with Vite, TypeScript, and React Query for efficient state management and data fetching. It serves as a lightweight alternative to Redux, promoting modern coding practices and keeping development skills up-to-date.
